This webpage delves into a study on elite college admissions, revealing that being very rich can be a significant advantage in securing a spot. The study examines data from Ivy League schools and other top universities, highlighting how wealthy applicants have a higher likelihood of admission, even with similar test scores. The site discusses topics such as legacy admissions, athletes' advantages, and nonacademic ratings in the admission process. If you're curious about how wealth influences college admissions, this website provides detailed insights.
